results.name: a(n) = A280500(n,A280503(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
program: (Scheme) (define (A280504 n) (A280500bi n (A280503 n))) ;; Code for A280500bi given in A280500.
xref: Cf. A044918 (very likely gives the positions of all ones).
